reviewText: Nice and well executed explanations from Claudiaon landscape drawing!

Claudia Nice takes you through the drawing basics, and believe me she knows what she's talking about. You can go at your own pace, and do the exercises over and over again until your satisfied you have it right. She is one of my favorite art instructors. She has written quite a few books. I have several of her books, and I found them to be great too. I believe you will be happy with this purchase.

This is a DVD we will watch more than once.  I tried some of her ideas today when I was drawing pine trees at a park.
It made a big difference.
I think if you are a beginner in drawing this DVD would be good for you. A lot of this I already knew. But I think that Trudy Friends books or DVDs (if you can get them) are better.
